name: Western Quakes
description:
Western Quakes

A game where you're a cowboy in earthquake territory who has to shoot incoming boulders with his extremely powerful shotgun!

--CONTROLS

W or UP key to jump and SPACE to shoot.

--ABOUT THE GAME

It's my first game jam and I made this game in one week.

Code, graphics, sounds and music by AvatarRedux.

I hope you like it : )

--AvatarRedux
